title: UCI fires Gravel World Championships race organizer PP Sports, still without confirmation of new course or promoter
content:
MTB Marathon World Championships race organizer Massimo Panighel is rumored to be creating a 'more demanding track than that of 2022' for the October 8 championship race in Italy.

Read the full article at UCI fires Gravel World Championships race organizer PP Sports, still without confirmation of new course or promoter on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
